Robo-Call to Secondary Students- 8/20/20

Good Afternoon! This is a quick update regarding our plan for secondary students. First, thank you to everyone who filled out the Instructional Options Declaration Form. After collecting responses from over 90% of our secondary students, we feel confident that we can offer 4 days per week of in person instruction for our students in 6th-12th grade. Students who have chosen in-person instruction will report to school Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, and Friday. On Wednesdays, they will complete work from home.

Students who have chosen Full-Virtual instruction will complete work from home Monday-Friday and meet with their teachers virtually on Wednesdays. More information will be coming soon, once schedules are set. Our goal is to have schedules done by August 27th. Mark your calendars for Virtual Meet Your Teacher Night on September 3rd at 5:30P.M.

If you have any immediate questions, please do not hesitate to contact us! Thank you, Mr. Tomlinson and Mrs. Gray

Graduation is scheduled for Friday, June 26th at 6:30 P.M. Please come prepared to celebrate our graduates while following social distancing practices. Due to this being an outdoor event, we are not limiting the number of guests each graduate can invite. Families may sit together, but we are requesting that families allow 6ft. between other families. Students and staff will be provided with a Pansophia Academy face mask, we strongly suggest that all others bring their own mask. Chairs will be provided; however, we ask that guests arrive a little early to set up chairs for their family and take care of your chairs as you leave. You may also choose to bring your own chairs.

Seniors, we need you to plan on attending a walk through for graduation on Thursday, June 25th at 6:30 P.M. and plan on arriving at the school on graduation day at 6 P.M.
